definition: constrained/restricted/forced to/under pressure to do sth
to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing

sentences.english: Mr Sallah had only recently had earlier charges dropped against him, following public pressure.
sentences.chinese: 迫於公衆壓力，先前對他的指控最近才得以消除。

sentences.english: Many people who lost their jobs during the Great Depression had to do whatever they could.
sentences.chinese: 許多人在大蕭條中失去工作，迫於生計，無所不爲。

sentences.english: He would eventually confess to the murders under the threat of torture.
sentences.chinese: 迫於嚴刑的威脅，他最後承認了所犯謀殺罪行。

sentences.english: Day came back from the outside, stomach pain again, forced to climb the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 天從外出回來，肚子又痛起來，迫於無奈爬樓梯。

sentences.english: Out of pressing need, the mother complies but the donator disappeared without forking up.
sentences.chinese: 迫於所需的母親照辦了，但是捐贈者卻食言消失了。

sentences.english: The dentist has expressed her regrets under great pressure from the public.
sentences.chinese: 迫於輿論壓力，這名女牙醫已表示後悔。

sentences.english: International pressure led to periodic crackdowns by Chinese authorities.
sentences.chinese: 迫於國際壓力，中國政府部門也曾階段性地進行打壓。

sentences.english: They did it in response to external pressures.
sentences.chinese: 他們是迫於外界壓力才做這件事的。

sentences.english: The old man was so poor that he had to beg in the street.
sentences.chinese: 那位老人迫於貧困，只好沿街乞討。

sentences.english: The Bundes Bank is under pressure to lower interest rate.
sentences.chinese: 邦德銀行迫於壓力要降低利息。
林振海迫於無法放了白冬菊。

sentences.english: Their troops recoiled before the attack of the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他們的部隊迫於敵人的進攻而後撤。

sentences.english: Forced by public opinion, fully suspended Australia's live cattle exports to Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 迫於輿論壓力，澳洲全面暫停了向印尼的活牛出口。

sentences.english: Our troops recoiled before the attack.
sentences.chinese: 我部隊迫於敵人的進攻而後撤。

sentences.english: In those days the case fails to make fine approach unrighted wrong gets snow by force of pressure.
sentences.chinese: 當年的案件迫於壓力沒能使纖凌沉冤得雪。

sentences.english: Later on, the Jordan government been given pressure to expose their findings and they did.
sentences.chinese: 稍後，約旦政府迫於壓力，公佈了他們的發現。
